pacmangame
Class Character

java.lang.Object
  pacmangame.Character
Direct Known Subclasses:
BadGuy, Hero
public class Character
extends java.lang.Object

This class creates a character object that will be either a hero or bad guy (subclasses) These characters will make up part of the game and the user will interact with them to complete the goal of the game.

Author:
dfudger

setLocation

public void setLocation(int x,
